aspects.description: All 4 required pages are implemented
aspects.extraDescription: Test: Check that index.html (Home), courses.html, mentors.html, and about.html files exist in the /src directory

aspects.description: Home page is accessible at index.html
aspects.extraDescription: Test: Navigate to index.html directly and verify it loads the Home page content

aspects.description: CSS files are properly organized in css/ directory
aspects.extraDescription: Test: Check that main CSS file exists in /src/css/ directory and is properly linked in HTML files

aspects.description: Assets are organized in appropriate directories
aspects.extraDescription: Test: Verify images are in /src/assets/images/ or similar organized structure, not scattered in root

aspects.description: No server-side or client-side frameworks used
aspects.extraDescription: Test: Check HTML files and dependencies - only HTML5 and CSS3 should be used, no React, Vue, Bootstrap, etc.

aspects.description: Header contains SkillShare Academy logo
aspects.extraDescription: Test: Check that header includes SkillShare Academy logo (text or image) on the left side, preferably the vertical purple logo

aspects.description: Navigation links to all 4 main pages
aspects.extraDescription: Test: Click each navigation link (Home, Courses, Mentors, About) and verify they navigate to correct pages

aspects.description: Header and navigation are consistent across all pages
aspects.extraDescription: Test: Visit all 4 pages and verify header/navigation look identical (except active page highlighting is allowed)

aspects.description: Mobile hamburger menu implemented (CSS-only)
aspects.extraDescription: Test: Resize browser to mobile width (360px) and verify hamburger menu appears and functions without JavaScript

aspects.description: Footer includes copyright notice
aspects.extraDescription: Test: Check that footer contains copyright notice with current year or appropriate text

aspects.description: Footer has four-column layout structure (desktop)
aspects.extraDescription: Test: On desktop view (1920px), verify footer displays in four-column layout with company info, Learn, Support, and Company sections

aspects.description: Social media icons are present and properly styled
aspects.extraDescription: Test: Check that footer includes social media icons for Facebook, Twitter, LinkedIn, Instagram (can be placeholder links)

aspects.description: Footer is consistent across all pages
aspects.extraDescription: Test: Visit all 4 pages and verify footer content and styling are identical

aspects.description: Hero section with two-column layout (desktop)
aspects.extraDescription: Test: On desktop view, verify hero section displays text content on left, image on right, with two call-to-action buttons below text

aspects.description: Platform benefits section with 6 benefit cards
aspects.extraDescription: Test: Check that benefits section displays 6 cards in grid layout, each with SVG icon, title, and description about credit system

aspects.description: Community impact statistics section
aspects.extraDescription: Test: Verify statistics section shows one large prominent statistic plus grid of smaller statistical items with community metrics

aspects.description: Featured courses section with credit earning badges
aspects.extraDescription: Test: Check course cards include image, title, instructor, rating with stars and numbers, duration, and credit earning badge with diamond icon

aspects.description: Testimonials section with community success stories
aspects.extraDescription: Test: Verify testimonials section displays grid of testimonial cards with specific credit amounts earned/used by community members

aspects.description: Page hero section with credit system explanation
aspects.extraDescription: Test: Check hero section has heading, description, and highlighted credit system explanation with diamond icon

aspects.description: Course filters with category tabs and search bar
aspects.extraDescription: Test: Verify filter section includes category buttons (All Free Courses, Development, Data Science, Marketing, Design, Business) and search bar with icon

aspects.description: Course cards contain all required elements
aspects.extraDescription: Test: Each course card includes image, title, instructor name, star rating with numbers, duration, skill level, credit badge with diamond icon, description, 'FREE' price, enrollment button

aspects.description: Mentor filters with search and dropdown controls
aspects.extraDescription: Test: Check filter section includes search bar and three dropdown selectors for expertise areas, experience levels, and rating filters

aspects.description: Featured mentors section with special badges
aspects.extraDescription: Test: Featured mentor cards have special badge, photo, detailed info (name, title, company, rating), skill tags, statistics, credit rate badge with diamond icon

aspects.description: Mentor cards display credit rates correctly
aspects.extraDescription: Test: All mentor cards show credit rate badge with diamond icon indicating different rates (8-15 credits per hour based on expertise)

aspects.description: Mission and vision section with two-column layout
aspects.extraDescription: Test: On desktop, verify two-column layout with mission text on left, image on right, and vision statement below

aspects.description: Community leaders section with team profiles
aspects.extraDescription: Test: Team member cards include photo, name, role title, bio description focusing on credit system responsibilities, social media links with icons

aspects.description: Contact section with form and contact information
aspects.extraDescription: Test: Two-column layout with contact info on left (email, phone, address, support hours with icons) and contact form on right (name, email, subject dropdown, message, submit button)

aspects.description: Purple-orange-cyan color scheme implementation
aspects.extraDescription: Test: Check for consistent use of purple (#7c3aed), orange (#f97316), cyan (#06b6d4) color palette throughout the site

aspects.description: Credit badges use proper gradient styling
aspects.extraDescription: Test: Verify credit earning badges use cyan-to-green gradient and mentor rate badges use purple-to-orange gradient

aspects.description: Overall visual design quality and creativity
judgementScoreDescription: Design lacks creativity and visual appeal, poor use of color scheme and layout
Design has basic visual appeal but limited creativity in layout and color usage
Design is visually appealing with good use of color scheme and creative layout elements
Excellent creative design with outstanding visual appeal, masterful use of color scheme, and innovative layout that effectively communicates the SkillShare Academy brand

aspects.description: Mobile responsiveness (360×640)
judgementScoreDescription: Website is completely broken on mobile viewport, content overflows or is unreadable
Basic mobile layout works but has significant issues with spacing, readability, or functionality
Good mobile responsive design with proper layout adaptation, readable text, and usable navigation
Excellent mobile experience with optimized layouts, perfect readability, smooth interactions, and thoughtful mobile-specific design choices

aspects.description: Tablet responsiveness (768×1024)
judgementScoreDescription: Website layout is broken or poorly adapted for tablet viewport
Basic tablet layout works but lacks optimization for the medium screen size
Good tablet responsive design with appropriate column adjustments and spacing
Excellent tablet experience with optimized layouts that make effective use of the medium screen real estate

aspects.description: Desktop responsiveness and layout quality (1920×1080)
judgementScoreDescription: Desktop layout is poorly implemented with bad spacing or broken elements
Basic desktop layout works but lacks polish in spacing and visual hierarchy
Good desktop layout with proper use of space, clear visual hierarchy, and effective multi-column layouts
Excellent desktop experience with outstanding use of large screen space, perfect visual hierarchy, and sophisticated layout techniques

aspects.description: Smooth responsive behavior between breakpoints
aspects.extraDescription: Test: Resize browser window gradually from 360px to 1920px width and verify no horizontal scrolling, content remains readable, and layout transitions smoothly

aspects.description: W3C HTML validation compliance
judgementScoreDescription: W3C validator reports more than 5 HTML errors per page
W3C validator reports 3-5 HTML errors per page
W3C validator reports 1-2 HTML errors per page
W3C validator reports no HTML errors on all implemented pages

aspects.description: W3C CSS validation compliance
judgementScoreDescription: W3C CSS validator reports more than 5 CSS errors
W3C CSS validator reports 3-5 CSS errors
W3C CSS validator reports 1-2 CSS errors
W3C CSS validator reports no CSS errors

aspects.description: Semantic HTML structure and accessibility
judgementScoreDescription: Poor semantic HTML with mostly divs, no accessibility features, missing alt text
Basic semantic HTML with some proper tags (header, nav, main, footer) and minimal accessibility features
Good semantic HTML structure with proper heading hierarchy, meaningful tags, and basic accessibility features
Excellent semantic HTML with comprehensive use of appropriate tags, perfect heading hierarchy, comprehensive alt text, and advanced accessibility features

aspects.description: Cross-browser compatibility
judgementScoreDescription: Website is completely broken in either Chrome or Firefox
Major visual or functional differences between Chrome and Firefox
Minor differences between browsers but mostly consistent appearance
Website looks and functions identically in Chrome, Firefox, Safari, and Edge
